channel.title: [Project] Client Launcher - Extra features inside - All Clients - Beta now
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b][u]V1 IS READY FOR BETA[/u][/b][/size]
[size=11pt][b][u]i've lost 50% of the PSD files. So the guide how do modify everything will take longer. I am recreating every image with the saved PSD files and resources i've got.[/u][/b][/size]
I was bored and was doing some random coding when i thought of something. "Why not make some kind of launcher for RSPS client?" So basicly i wanted to create something so people can read patch notes, news, even vote and donate or simply view their highscores with just 1 program. Ofcourse the owner of the server would have full control without me bieng a part of it.
[img]http://screensnapr.com/e/DHOAAv.png[/img]
[B][U]Features[/U][/B]
[ul][li]Start your Client[/li] [li]Download your updates - with Download Bar (.jar only, cache must be downloaded from .jar aswell)[/li] [li]Webpage for your update notes / highscores / vote and donate page[/li] [li]FULLY CUSTOMIZEABLE[/li] [li]Little guide how to configure it[/li] [li]Find Client button[/li] [li]Saves location when closed and uses last location when startup. Also checks if it's the user's first time.[/li][/ul]
Adding more to the list when i can think of some stuff or if you have any idea's, feel free to share them.
[B][U]Changelog[/U][/B]
[ul][li]Created new project on VB - still no project name :p - 18/11/11[/li] [li]Made the custom frame close trough new close button xD. Also added a "Play" Button to start the client. Still got problems with Java -.- - 18/11/11[/li] [li]Made all clickable buttons have a nice glow when hovered just for the epicness :p - 18/11/11[/li] [li]Added "Find Client" Button so users can select your client. Should fix the problem with "Client not found?" - 19/11/11[/li] [li]Added an extra feature so to the "Find Client" button. Should fix the problem that caused an error when closing the client. Also saves the setting when a location is selected - 19/11/11[/li] [li]Made first version of the news page - 19/11/11[/li] [li]First version is ready to go - 2/12/11[/li][/ul]
[B][U]Media[/U][/B] Startup (only the first time) [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/O3ptWr.png[/img]
The Launcher + The site (The website isn't finished yet. [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/ru4Mpf.png[/img]
Downloader (need to edit some stuff in there to cancel download but works 100%) -Used the MoparscapeInstaller as example, you can use any url- [img]http://screensnapr.com/e/Fuhsxh.png[/img]
V1 of the launcher is ready to be downlaoded and used, Note: You can't customize anything yet as i am testing the program. Please post bugs or suggestions below!
Download: (Edited the link to an updated version to indicate that this is a beta) http://www.mediafire.com/?ho2ggzy2v4h2gvm
Virus Scan Result (Used VirusTotal.com) [code] File name: RSPS Client Launcher.exe Submission date: 2011-12-02 12:25:35 (UTC) Current status: finished Result: 0/ 43 (0.0%)
Antivirus Version Last Update Result AhnLab-V3 2011.12.01.02 2011.12.01 - AntiVir 7.11.18.199 2011.12.02 - Antiy-AVL 2.0.3.7 2011.12.02 - Avast 6.0.1289.0 2011.12.02 - AVG 10.0.0.1190 2011.12.02 - BitDefender 7.2 2011.12.02 - ByteHero 1.0.0.1 2011.11.29 - CAT-QuickHeal 12.00 2011.12.02 - ClamAV 0.97.3.0 2011.12.02 - Commtouch 5.3.2.6 2011.12.02 - Comodo 10810 2011.12.02 - DrWeb 5.0.2.03300 2011.12.02 - Emsisoft 5.1.0.11 2011.12.02 - eSafe 7.0.17.0 2011.12.01 - eTrust-Vet 37.0.9599 2011.12.02 - F-Prot 4.6.5.141 2011.11.29 - F-Secure 9.0.16440.0 2011.12.02 - Fortinet 4.3.388.0 2011.12.02 - GData 22 2011.12.02 - Ikarus T3.1.1.109.0 2011.12.02 - Jiangmin 13.0.900 2011.12.02 - K7AntiVirus 9.119.5570 2011.11.30 - Kaspersky 9.0.0.837 2011.12.02 - McAfee 5.400.0.1158 2011.12.02 - McAfee-GW-Edition 2010.1D 2011.12.02 - Microsoft 1.7903 2011.12.02 - NOD32 6668 2011.12.01 - Norman 6.07.13 2011.12.02 - nProtect 2011-12-02.01 2011.12.02 - Panda 10.0.3.5 2011.12.01 - PCTools 8.0.0.5 2011.12.02 - Prevx 3.0 2011.12.02 - Rising 23.86.04.02 2011.12.02 - Sophos 4.71.0 2011.12.02 - SUPERAntiSpyware 4.40.0.1006 2011.12.02 - Symantec 20111.2.0.82 2011.12.02 - TheHacker 6.7.0.1.352 2011.12.01 - TrendMicro 9.500.0.1008 2011.12.02 - TrendMicro-HouseCall 9.500.0.1008 2011.12.02 - VBA32 3.12.16.4 2011.12.01 - VIPRE 11191 2011.12.02 - ViRobot 2011.12.2.4805 2011.12.02 - VirusBuster 14.1.95.0 2011.12.01 - [/code]

[/quote]

And i’m aware of the problem that not everyone has Windows to run this. But i’m thinking of Mono Framework to solve this problem as it can develop for more OS[/quote]
